rooms.description: An open entrance area with Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow and ample natural light. The room features a reception desk and elegant finishes.
Spacious living area with modern furniture and integrated smart home systems for comfort. Windows are strategically placed for optimal sunlight based on Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room, offering a view of the courtyard. Designed to facilitate family interaction and ensure harmony with surrounding spaces.
Modern kitchen featuring state-of-the-art appliances. Placed in an auspicious direction to enhance positive energy flow according to Vastu guidelines.
Luxurious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. The orientation of the room is optimized for relaxation and balance.
Cozy guest bedroom that provides privacy while still being connected to central areas of the house. Vastu-aligned windows ensure proper airflow.
Central courtyard designed as a relaxing outdoor space with landscaping and water features. It aligns with traditional Indian architecture for natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large windows are strategically placed to allow maximum natural light and maintain a balance as per Vastu principles.
Elegant doors designed for seamless connectivity between rooms, ensuring privacy and ease of movement in accordance with design norms.
